category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 8 (Application for Village Entry)
contents: Article 8 (Application for Village Entry) ① If a person subject to the training plan in Article 6 wishes to enter the athlete village, the head of the member sport organization must apply in advance to the athlete village head. ② The head of a member sport organization may apply to the head of the athlete’s village to allow the person subject to Article 7, Paragraph 4 to enter the athlete’s village at the relevant organization’s expense. In this case, in principle, the required expenses must be paid in full to the athlete's village before entering the village.
